## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] SwiftLint passes with no warnings
- [ ] No force unwraps (`!`) unless absolutely necessary and documented
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate
- [ ] No hardcoded strings (use localization)

### Documentation
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] MARK comments organize the file
- [ ] Public APIs are documented
- [ ] README updated (if needed)

### Accessibility
- [ ] VoiceOver support verified
- [ ] Dynamic type works correctly
- [ ] Color contrast is sufficient
- [ ] Touch targets are at least 44x44pt

### Performance
- [ ] No memory leaks (verified with Instruments)
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders
- [ ] Images are properly sized and compressed
